commands: effect give @s minecraft:wither 1 255 false
execute as @s at @s run particle minecraft:large_smoke ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.01 10 force
execute as @s at @s run particle minecraft:falling_lava ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.01 10 force
damage @s 10 minecraft:on_fire at ~ ~ ~

pingu_setup.title: null
first_tick_commands: execute as @s at @s run scale set pehkui:step_height 1.2 @s
execute as @s at @s run scale set pehkui:base 0.85 @s
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:dolphins_grace infinite 5 true

pingu_speed_start.title: Movement Skill Tree
pingu_speed_start.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to upgrade your various movement stats for Pingu.

pingu_speed.title: Pingu's Snow Day
pingu_speed.description: Pingu learns to run quicker due to his harsh environment.

pingu_speed2.title: Pingu's Reinforcement
pingu_speed2.description: Pingu naturally becomes faster from age.

pingu_iceriding.title: Nootilious Speed
pingu_iceriding.description: Run Even Faster when on types of ice and snow.

pingu_iceriding2.title: null
commands: execute as @s at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ #snappack:snow_and_ice run attribute @s minecraft:generic.movement_speed modifier add e6c5d8f2-1b34-4a7f-8a92-5d6e7c8b9a01 IceSkating 0.35 add
execute as @s at @s if block ~ ~ ~ #snappack:snow_and_ice run attribute @s minecraft:generic.movement_speed modifier add e6c5d8f2-1b34-4a7f-8a92-5d6e7c8b9a01 IceSkating 0.35 add

execute as @s at @s unless block ~ ~-1 ~ #snappack:snow_and_ice unless block ~ ~ ~ #snappack:snow_and_ice run attribute @s minecraft:generic.movement_speed modifier remove e6c5d8f2-1b34-4a7f-8a92-5d6e7c8b9a01

pingu_start.title: The Power of Pingu The Penguin
pingu_start.description:
You've unlocked the abilities of Pingu the Penguin. 
God Bless Your Soul.

pingu_defense_start.title: Penguin Defense
pingu_defense_start.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to upgrade your defenses for your Pingu powers.

pingu_armor.title: Penguin Armor
pingu_armor.description: Natural protections for Pingu the penguin.

pingu_armor2.title: Penguin Armor lv2
pingu_armor2.description: Pingu's struggles has led him to have more resilence than ever before.

health.title: Increased Health
health.description: Dealing with the frosty climate, Pingu naturally has more health than others.

pingu_healing.title: Frosty Regen
pingu_healing.description: Pingu can regen health faster than normal.

pingu_toughness.title: Penguin Toughness
pingu_toughness.description: Not even apex predators can get though Pingu's skin.

pingu_toughness2.title: Penguin Toughness lv2
pingu_toughness2.description: They can try, Oh they can try.

description.translate: Pingu uses his enchanced lungs to breathe in the water for a short time, and regen his health.

pingu_ability1.title: Penguin Lungs
commands: execute at @s run playsound snappack:pingu.lung master @a[distance=..10] ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:conduit_power 30 1 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:water_breathing 30 1 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:regeneration 7 2 false
execute at @s run particle minecraft:splash ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.01 20 force

description.translate:
Pingu uses his lungs and his beak to send out a shockwave against his enemies
NOTE: this does damage to ALL nearby entities, dont use near pets.

pingu_ability2.title: NOOOOOOOT!
commands: execute at @s run particle minecraft:snowflake ~ ~1 ~ 1 0.5 1 0.1 40 force
execute at @s run playsound snappack:pingu.shock master @a[distance=..10] ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @e[distance=..5] at @s run damage @s 25 minecraft:freeze
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..7] minecraft:slowness 25 2 false
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..7] fsang:sound_poisoning 10 1 false

description.translate: Pingu uses a snowball to freeze his enemies in their tracks! Also grants immunity to slowness!

entity_data.CommandOnBlockHit: execute at @s run particle minecraft:snowflake ~ ~1 ~ 1 0.3 0.3 0.3 20 force

pingu_noslowness.title: null
commands: effect clear @s minecraft:slowness

description.translate:
Turns Pingu into an Apex Predator.
Come back when you unlock all your other abilities.

apex_pingu_ability1.title: Penguin Lungs
commands: execute at @s run playsound snappack:pingu.lung master @a[distance=..10] ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:conduit_power 45 1 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:water_breathing 45 1 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:regeneration 10 4 false
execute at @s run particle minecraft:splash ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.01 20 force

apex_pingu_ability2.title: NOOOOOOOOOOOT!
commands: execute at @s run particle minecraft:snowflake ~ ~1 ~ 1 0.5 1 0.3 50 force
execute at @s run playsound snappack:pingu.shock master @a[distance=..10] ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @e[distance=..7] at @s run damage @s 50 minecraft:freeze
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..10] minecraft:slowness 35 2 false
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..10] fsang:sound_poisoning 20 2 false
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..10] minecraft:darkness 5 1 false
execute at @s run effect give @e[distance=..10] minecraft:weakness 20 2 false

apex_pingu_speed.title: Pingu's Snow Day
apex_pingu_speed.description: Pingu learns to run quicker due to his harsh environment.

apex_pingu_fall.title: Pingu's Snow Day
apex_pingu_fall.description: Pingu learns to run quicker due to his harsh environment.

apex_health.title: Increased Health
apex_health.description: Dealing with the frosty climate, Pingu naturally has more health than others.

apex_pingu_healing.title: Frosty Regen
apex_pingu_healing.description: Pingu's natural ability to regenerate more than others.

apex_pingu_toughness.title: Penguin Toughness
apex_pingu_toughness.description: Not even apex predators can get though Pingu's skin.

apex_pingu_ability.title: Apex Ability By Diana :3
commands: execute at @s run playsound snappack:pingu.apex master @a[distance=..10] ~ ~ ~ 1 1
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:strength 45 2 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:resistance 45 0 false
execute as @s at @s run effect give @s minecraft:speed 45 2 false
execute at @s positioned ~ ~ ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~2 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~3 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~4 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~5 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~6 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~7 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~8 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~9 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force
execute at @s positioned ~ ~10 ~ run particle minecraft:glow ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 0.05 1 force

entity_data.CommandOnBlockHit: execute at @s run particle minecraft:snowflake ~ ~1 ~ 1 0.3 0.3 0.3 20 force

pingu_evolution.title: Pingu Evolution
commands: superpower add snappack:pingu_evolved @s
ability lock @s snappack:pingu pingu_evolution

pingu_size_dampen.title: Pingu Size Reset
commands: scale reset @s

pingu_size_fix.title: Pingu Size Reset
first_tick_commands: execute as @s at @s run scale set pehkui:step_height 1.2 @s
execute as @s at @s run scale set pehkui:base 0.85 @s
